name: yuk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of disgust (= strong dislike and disapproval): Yuk! That's disgusting! This cake tastes strange. Yuk! Yuk yuk yuk. That's revolting. Synonym
yuck
More examplesFewer examplesHe pulled a face. "Yuk!"The baby's dribbling on me! Yuk!The leaves are all covered in slugs and snails. Yuk!Yuk, is all I can say to that.It was pickled herrings, and I don't like raw fish, yuk!The baking had a strong garlic flavour, fine perhaps in bread, but in cakes, yuk!
